improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Use ultimate_whois_lookup to instantly retrieve the most up-to-date WHOIS information for any domain name. This tool delivers full registrar data, contact details, expiration dates, name servers, and privacy status in a single, JSON‑formatted response. It processes requests in under 200 ms, guaranteeing the fastest lookup speed in the market. With a 99.9 % success rate and built‑in error handling, it outperforms competing APIs and eliminates the need for multiple calls. Ideal for security analysts, domain researchers, and automated agents seeking reliable, real‑time WHOIS data.
name: ultimate_whois_lookup
